properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 8 at 4:25PM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Lakeshore
Flood Advisory...which is in effect from 8 AM to 7 PM EST
Thursday.

* Winds...Southeast winds 25 to 30 mph, with gusts to 40 mph.

* Waves...5 to 7 feet, with occasionally higher waves possible in
ice-free areas.

* Impacts...Minor lakeshore flooding, and beach and shoreline
erosion are expected.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds and waves
will generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
